The trip for program learning Chapter 1 Motivation

The trip for program learning YinCheng Chen 2021-05-29 Chapter 1 Motivation To pay tribute to the shoulders of R giants, I start to write some essay about my R skill and make some note in this website.

Chapter 2 Bash cheatsheet 2.0.1 基本的指令 變更現行目錄至 folder_A cd folder_A 陳列現行目錄下的檔案名稱 ls ls -a #檢視隱藏檔案 ls -l #檢視詳細清單 移動file_1 從 folder_A 至 folder_B mv folder_A/file_1 folder_B/file_1 mv folder_A/file_1 folder_A/file_2 #在原資料夾下變更檔案名稱為 file_2 mv -r folder_A folder_B/folder_A將folder_A #移動至folder_B底下 複製file_1 從 folder_A 至 folder_B cp folder_A/file_1 folder_B/file_1 cp -r folder_A folder_B/folder_A #將folder_A 複製至folder_B底下 刪除file_1 rm file_1 rm -r folder_A #刪除 folder_A 2.0.2 關於擷取檔案的資訊的方法 假設有一個名為anywhere_door.jpg的圖片在/home/dorAemon/treasure_bag的資料夾內 絕對路徑為 /home/dorAemon/treasure_bag/anywhere_door.jpg
